snippet.title: Parkitect: Deluxe Edition | Official Trailer | PS5/4 and Xbox One/Series
snippet.description:
Developed by Texel Raptor and published by BlitWorks Games. Parkitect arrives for the first time to PlayStation and Xbox consoles on a Deluxe Edition on July 3rd, including DLCs ‘Booms and Blooms’ and ‘A taste of Adventure’. With a completely new button mapping and UI designed and adapted completely to controllers for a comfortable experience.

Build and manage your own amusement park in this complete tycoon full of content; a modern take on oldschool simulation games. Find the perfect balance between functionality, design and fun.

Parks need planning… more planning than just deciding where to put that crazy rollercoaster! Decor using scenery to higher up the immersion, hire staff and handle their jobs, upgrade the park with advanced systems and transit options, manage the prices, assemble the rollercoasters and maximize your client’s fun!

Genres: tycoon, management, building, simulation, sandbox, economy, time management, single player, city builder.
